target_name: Facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people, including through the implementation of planned and well-managed migration policies
computation_definitions:
Data unavailable (Type4)
There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
indicator_name: Number of people who died or disappeared in the process of migration towards an international destination
indicator_definition: The number of migrants who died at the external borders of states or in the process of migration towards an international destination, based on the Missing Migrants Project (MMP) data.
global_indicator_name: Number of people who died or disappeared in the process of migration towards an international destination
title: Untitled
graph_title: 국제이주 과정에서 사망하거나 실종된 사람의 수
